seller_name: SRI. G. ANIL KUMAR S/O. G. SHANKER, M/s. PVNR CONSTRUCTIONS, represented by its Managing Partners; SRI. V.NARAYANA REDDY S/O SUBBA REDDY, SRI. K. RAMACHANDRA REDDY S/O. SESHI REDDY
address_2: Shankar Green Homes, Ameenpur Village, (As per site)
planned_area_source: As per copy of gram panchayat plan
area_comments: As per the copy of gram panchayat plan and sale deed, 1,224 sft was identified to be the built-up area. The land area as per sale deed is 1,656 sft (184 sq. yds). The area adopted for valuation is based on approved plan and site inspection.
occupancy_comments: Based on the information and visual inspection, the subject property is observed to be self-occupied by the owner.
construction_comments: The property is fully constructed and occupied.
address_2_comparable_1: Green Villas Road No. 4 (As per site)
market_value_definition: Market Value is defined as 'an opinion of the best price at which the sale of an interest in property would have been completed unconditionally for cash consideration on the date of the valuation, assuming (1) a willing seller; (2) that, prior to the date of valuation, there had been a reasonable period (having regard to the nature of the property and the state of the market) for the proper marketing of the interest and for the agreement of the sale price; (3) that, the state of the market, level of values and other circumstances were, on any earlier assumed date of exchange of contracts, the same as on the date of valuation; (4) that no account is taken of any additional bid by a prospective buyer with a special interest; (5) that both parties to the transaction had acted knowledgeably, prudently and without compulsion.'
valuer_comments: • The subject property is a residential independent house located at Plot No. 161, Shankar Green Homes, Ameenpur Village, Patancheru Mandal, Medak District, Telangana State. • As per the copy of sale deed provided, the land area for the subject property was identified as 1,656 sft (184 sq. yds). • Built-up area as per the copy of gram panchayat plan is 1,224 sft. • The area adopted for valuation is based on the approved plan and site inspection. • The valuation method is based on the land and building approach, supported by available documentation. • The property is self-occupied and was observed in good condition. • No significant deviations in area or projections were found beyond normal balconies, portico, and staircase. • No visible negative area or encroachments were observed. • The property is within city/urban municipal limits and surrounded by residential developments. • All assumptions are based on the documents provided and on the physical inspection of the property.
valuer_declaration: I confirm that the market value for the subject property as on 10 June 2024 is INR 17,76,800/- [Seventeen lakh seventy six thousand eight hundred rupees] taking into consideration the market dynamics and the condition of the property, its location, and amenities available.
disclaimer_text: Please note that the above is a valuation and not a structural survey. CBRE is not responsible to HSBC or the purchaser of the above property for any flaws and/or faults with the property not detected by the above Valuer.
